text: satyaviśvāsikaḷē, niṅṅaḷ (cila) satyaniṣēdhikaḷeppēāleyākarut‌. taṅṅaḷuṭe sahēādaraṅṅaḷ yātrapēākukayēā, yēād'dhākkaḷāyi puṟappeṭukayēā ceytiṭṭ maraṇamaṭayukayāṇeṅkil avar paṟayuṁ: ivar ñaṅṅaḷuṭe aṭuttāyirunneṅkil maraṇappeṭukayēā keāllappeṭukayēā illāyirunnu. aṅṅane allāhu at avaruṭe manas'sukaḷil oru khēdamākkivekkunnu. allāhuvāṇ jīvippikkukayuṁ marippikkukayuṁ ceyyunnat‌. allāhu niṅṅaḷ pravarttikkunnatellāṁ kaṇṭaṟiyunnavanumatre
